On 4/14/13 12:21 PM, Umanda Dikwatta wrote:
> Heritrix 1.14.4 also not working...It does not start. Is there a problem
> with a server ?

You'll have to be more specific than "not working" or "does not start" 
to know what you're talking about.

What did you try, what were you expecting, what did you see instead?

Heritrix 1.14.4 certainly "works" once you have it installed, and it 
does not require any server dependencies to operate.

- Gordon
